title: Spanish Speaking Staff, Business Center, Carpeting
posting_body: Welcome to The Forest at Duck CreekThe Forest at Duck Creek is located in the beautiful City of Garland just 20 minutes from Downtown Dallas.
Our quite, rustic oasis is conveniently located to dining, shopping, jogging and walking trails with 1, 2, and 3 bedroom floor plans to suite your needs.
We offer a beautiful sparkling pool, on site laundry facilities nestled within our beautifully landscape through the community.
Stop in today and speak with one of our top notch Management staff, we are ready to walk you through the leasing process and look forward to you becoming a member of our community.
Professionally Managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc., TX - License # 9003183
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
